resources.string: Root detected, do you want to grant me permission using root?

This app needs WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission in order to work. 

 You can grant permission via ADB or ROOT. 

 To grant permission using ADB: 

 adb shell pm grant in.tsdo.elw android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS 

 After you granted the permission, press Check Again. 



 If you have trouble using ADB, please consult internet.
Permission check failed, please try using the ADB command again
